raw_comment:
What do you notice?
I notice that people in Indonesia are very optimistic about the world getting better with each generation.

What do you wonder? I wonder why some locations are more optimistic than others.

How does this relate to you and your community? This relates to me because I'm 18 years old so I am part of the 15-24-year-olds in the U.S. 

What’s going on in this graph? Create a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea. "Are People More Optimistic About the Future Nowadays?"
ace_sentences: People in Indonesia are very optimistic.
People in Indonesia think that the world gets better with each generation.
Some locations are more optimistic than other locations.
I wonder why some locations are more optimistic than other locations.
I am part of the 15-24-year-olds in the U.S.
Are people more optimistic about the future nowadays?
